tool_description: Unofficial API. RESTful web service to access information related with the european MRLs (Maximum Residue Levels) in food/feed. The data is automatically updated every day, retrieved from the publicly accesible EU Pesticides Database, managed by the European Commission.
name: EU MRLs API
title: EU MRLs API

api_list.name: MRLs
api_list.description: Responses with the MRL values for a given Residue and/or a specific food product (query parameters).

api_list.name: Residues definition
api_list.description: Gives the full list of residue definitions, necessary to query for MRLs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://eu-mrls-api.p.rapidapi.com/residueslist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eu-mrls-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Food products
api_list.description: Gives the full list of food commodities together with their food code, necessary to query for MRLs
